Sentencas: Novel nano-oxide dispersed ferritic stainless steel alloys have been developed as potential interconnect materials for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Nano-CeO2 and -LaCrO3 dispersed ferritic stainless steels as potential interconnect materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Nanopowders of CeO2 and LaCrO3 were mixed with ferritic stainless steel powder (SUS430) using conventional ball milling.
Titulo: Nano-CeO2 and -LaCrO3 dispersed ferritic stainless steels as potential interconnect materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Rectangular pellets were prepared and sintered at 1400 degrees C in pure H-2.
Titulo: Nano-CeO2 and -LaCrO3 dispersed ferritic stainless steels as potential interconnect materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The microstructural analysis of the sintered pellets showed a uniform distribution of oxide particles.
Titulo: Nano-CeO2 and -LaCrO3 dispersed ferritic stainless steels as potential interconnect materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Long-term area specific resistance (ASR) of the pellets was monitored using the four probe DC method at 800 degrees C for 1000 h in air, revealing that an increase in the CeO2 amount from 0.5 to 3 and 5 wt % increased the oxidation resistance of the steel.
Titulo: Nano-CeO2 and -LaCrO3 dispersed ferritic stainless steels as potential interconnect materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: ASR values as low 32.2 and 5.5 m Omega cm(2) were observed, respectively, for 3 and 5 wt % nano-CeO2 dispersed SUS430 steel.
Titulo: Nano-CeO2 and -LaCrO3 dispersed ferritic stainless steels as potential interconnect materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, in the case of LaCrO3 addition, no such relationship between the oxidation resistance and LaCrO3 concentration was found.
Titulo: Nano-CeO2 and -LaCrO3 dispersed ferritic stainless steels as potential interconnect materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study showed that the dispersed nano-CeO2 particles effectively reduced the Cr2O3 scale growth, likely by retarding the inward diffusion of oxygen, hence resulting in a high oxidation resistance at the SOFC operating conditions.
Titulo: Nano-CeO2 and -LaCrO3 dispersed ferritic stainless steels as potential interconnect materials for solid oxide fuel cells
Nano-CeO2 and -LaCrO3 dispersed ferritic stainless steels as potential interconnect materials for solid oxide fuel cells
Nano-CeO2 and -LaCrO3 dispersed ferritic stainless steels as potential interconnect materials for solid oxide fuel cells
